company

Class Manager

  • java.lang.Object
    • company.Person
      • company.Employee
        • company.Manager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Manager
extends Employee
implements java.io.Serializable
    A manager is a specialized employee, who can manage (i.e be head manager of) a department. Only one manager is head manager per department, and there should always be one. A head manager keep his position until he is replaced by another, or until he is the only left in his department.
    Author:
    MECHERIKI Charles
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
